name: Loopz (itch)
description:
Inspired by Audiogenic's 1990 game designed and programmed by Ian Upton, with a modern twist.

The main focus is on the playing board where random pieces of different shapes are presented to the player. A shape is either a single square containing a straight line or 90° corner or a combination of multiple such squares. The player must then try to make loops out of them. Once a loop is completed, all pieces involved will disappear.
Become Loopz's Master and Catch Bonus, and avoid penalty to make more an more Loops.
